content.question: If <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label=" the integral from 1 to 2 of f of open parentheses x minus c close parentheses with respect to x equals 5"> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow><munderover> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>1</mn> <mn>2</mn> </munderover> <mi>f</mi> </mrow> </mstyle><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>c</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWdXbWdaeaapeGaamOzaaWcpaqaa8qacaaIXaaapaqaa8qacaaI YaaaniabgUIiYdGccaGGOaGaamiEaiabgkHiTiaadogacaGGPaGaam izaiaadIhacqGH9aqpcaaI1aaaaa@431E@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> where c is a constant, then <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the integral from 1 minus c to 2 minus c of f of x with respect to x equals"> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow><munderover> <mo>∫</mo> <mrow> <mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>c</mi></mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>c</mi></mrow> </munderover> <mi>f</mi> </mrow> </mstyle><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWdXbWdaeaapeGaamOzaaWcpaqaa8qacaaIXaGaeyOeI0Iaam4y aaWdaeaapeGaaGOmaiabgkHiTiaadogaa0Gaey4kIipakiaacIcaca WG4bGaaiykaiaadsgacaWG4bGaeyypa0daaa@4434@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>
